Stan Lee Confirms His Avengers Cameo, Wants To Be In Batman v Superman By Sean O'Connell Random Article Blend Guardians of the Galaxy largely is set in outer space, it was believed Stan Lee might not make the cut. This



Stan Lee was speaking at the London Film and Comic-Con convention (via Ant-Man and, maybe, Doctor Strange. And because he is in London for the conference, he of course mentions that you can look for him in the upcoming The Avengers: Age of Ultron. Stan Lee said:
